title: Bear Has a Story to Tell
description: A VR experience about friendship, where users find clues to uncover the story together.
author: Philip C. Stead
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=imkLeTETGfU

content.caption: Users enter the room, wearing the VR devices showing the natural environment of the story.
Here the user is introduced to the backstory.
Instructions telling users to find clues to locate the bear.
Choose your role, single player or multiple user.
The users see an immersive natural environment when they wear the VR headset.
Users seek out the clues which moves them to the next scene.
Each natural environment is based the seasons from the book. Users get different clues each season.
In Autumn when you find the clue, you may progress to the next season.Oversize real object for user to chop the tress.
Users collect all the clues, following them to find the bear.
The users find the bear, who can finally share his story.
